title: build fails
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. cd $GOROOT && ./make.bash


What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

I expect to have everything build, but it fails with message:

%%%% making cmd/cgo %%%%                                    
                                                            
/root/bin/8g -o _go_.8 ast.go gcc.go main.go out.go util.go 
/root/bin/8l -o cgo _go_.8                                  
main.parse: runtime.morestack not defined                   
make: *** [cgo] Error 1                                     

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

hg tip reports:

changeset:   5866:ca6239b2bf89
